attributes.action: immediately cut all links with Saudi Arabia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Saudi Arabia has demonstrated, again, that it is the vilest of places committing atrocities in the name of religion.  This is something the voters of this country are not prepared to put up with any longer.  Cut all ties and ban any organisation or company dealing with anybody who has the remotest of links with Saudi Arabia.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
